name: School Days LxH
synopsis: Itou Makoto is an average guy living an average life in an average town. He harbors feelings for the beautiful girl, Katsura Kotonoha, who shares his train to school, but is much too shy to approach her -until one day, his classmate Sekai convinces him to take the plunge. So begins a romance both bitter and sweet, as three young hearts weave a complex web of love, jealousy, and desire.
